General.Name: Europa Metals Ltd
General.Description: Europa Metals Limited is involved in the exploration for mineral properties. The company primarily explores for lead, zinc, and silver deposits. Its flagship project is the Toral project located in the province of Castilla y León, northwest Spain. The company was formerly known as Ferrum Crescent Limited and changed its name to Europa Metals Limited in June 2018. Europa Metals Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 99 St Georges Terrace, Perth, WA, Australia, 6000
